Info.Description: Run the DDR ram test on CR7.

HBootSnippet.Snippet:
<!-- R7: Write the ramtest parameters for R7 and A9 core CR7 test area start 0x40000000 test area end 0x7fffffff test area size 0x40000000 unsigned 32 bit values as bytes in little endian order --> <!-- CR7 parameters --> <Data> <Hex address="0x0003ff80"> 00 00 00 40 <!-- 0x40000000 Start address of DDR RAM --> 00 00 00 40 <!-- 0x40000000 Size in bytes --> ff 01 00 00 <!-- Test Cases --> 00 00 00 00 <!-- Loops --> 00 00 00 00 <!-- PerfTestCases --> 00 00 00 00 <!-- Status LED MMIO numbers --> 01 00 00 00 <!-- Enable UART --> 00 00 00 ff <!-- tag mask --> 00 00 00 11 <!-- tag value --> </Hex> </Data>
<!-- R7: load ram test for R7 --> <Data> <File name="@tElfCR7" /> </Data>
<!-- R7: run ram test --> <Execute> <File name="@tElfCR7" /> <R0>0x0003ff80</R0> <!-- address of parameter block --> </Execute>
